verbs.description: A Trump fan [V: is] facing fierce criticism after he brought his open - carry pistol and a giant American flag to the scene of a school shooting in Santa Fe , Texas that resulted in the reported deaths of multiple students .

[ARG0: A Trump fan] is [V: facing] [ARG1: fierce criticism] [ARGM-TMP: after he brought his open - carry pistol and a giant American flag to the scene of a school shooting in Santa Fe , Texas that resulted in the reported deaths of multiple students] .

A Trump fan is facing fierce criticism after [ARG0: he] [V: brought] [ARG1: his open - carry pistol and a giant American flag] [ARG2: to the scene of a school shooting in Santa Fe , Texas that resulted in the reported deaths of multiple students] .

A Trump fan is facing fierce criticism after he brought his open - carry pistol and a giant American flag to the scene of [ARG1: a school shooting in Santa Fe , Texas] [R-ARG1: that] [V: resulted] [ARG2: in the reported deaths of multiple students] .

A Trump fan is facing fierce criticism after he brought his open - carry pistol and a giant American flag to the scene of a school shooting in Santa Fe , Texas that resulted in the [V: reported] [ARG1: deaths] of multiple students .
